name: Hôtel Mayflower Opera
description: Situated in the 8th district of Paris, just 18 minutes' walk from Opéra Garnier, Hôtel Mayflower Opéra offers accommodation with free WiFi. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, desk or seating area and wardrobe. A coffee machine is also featured in the room. Each room has a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. Breakfast is served daily in the dining room. A number of restaurants can be reached within walking distance. Additional facilities include a 24-hour front desk at the property and the on-site bar. Sacré-Coeur is 1.6 km from Hôtel Mayflower Opéra, while Avenue des Champs-Elysées is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Orly Airport, 17 km from the property. The nearest station is Rome Metro Station, a 2-minute walk away from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Pont Royal
description: Hotel Pont Royal offers elegant accommodation and free internet. It is located in the trendy Saint Germain des Prés area on Paris’s left bank, near art galleries and the Louvre. Guest rooms at the Hotel Pont Royal are air-conditioned. They include a minibar, safe, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and modern en suite facilities. A full buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every day before work or sightseeing. Atelier St Germain de Joel Robuchon, the hotel’s restaurant, is internationally acclaimed and serves gourmet cuisine. The Pont Royal’s central location means guests can explore the city on foot or by Metro. Its rich history (it has welcomed famous artists and writers, including Albert Camus and Boris Vian) makes it the perfect place to experience this romantic city.

name: Hotel Regina Louvre
description: The luxurious Hôtel Regina Louvre is located in the heart of Paris in the fashion, shopping and museum district, overlooking the Louvre. It first opened in 1900 for the world's fair and is located opposite Tuileries Gardens. Designed in an elegant style with period furniture, the air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, telephone and safe. Some rooms have views of Tuileries Gardens and the Louvre. Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel and facilities for making coffee and tea can be found in each room. Both continental and buffet breakfasts are prepared every day. Children from 6 until 12 years old can enjoy the buffet breakfast at a reduced cost. Guests can enjoy French, seasonal cuisine at the restaurant Salon Rivoli and dine on the terrace on sunny days. You can relax with a refreshing drink in the lounge bar, which has a typical British decor or indulge with luxurious teas and pastries. Room service, a limousine service and a 24-hour reception with concierge are among the additional services available at this hotel. Pets under 6 kg are also welcome. The hotel is just a 2-minute walk from Tuileries Metro Station, which provides direct access to the Opera Garnier and the Champs-Elysees. Place Vendôme and its luxury boutiques are situated 750 metres away. The Musée d’Orsay is a 15-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Villa Lutece Port Royal
description: Situated in the heart of Paris 13th arrondissement, near the Jardin des Plantes and the National Library, is the very stylish Villa Lutèce Port Royal hotel. The Villa Lutèce features air-conditioned rooms that are stylishly decorated and equipped with a minibar. The private bathrooms feature a modern décor and a shower or a bath. Before venturing out to visit Paris, you can enjoy the breakfast buffet in the dining area. Room service is available all day and the hotel features a bar where guests can socialize over a drink. Staying at the Villa Lutèce Port Royal places you in the centre of the world's most visited city. In the surrounding area you will find a variety of restaurants that offer traditional and international cuisine, lively night life and many of the city's most famous sights.

name: Sinner Paris
description: Sinner is the first hotel in the Evok Hotels Collection to lay claim to a lifestyle of relaxed luxury, bringing boldness and the ultimate sophistication straight to the gates of Le Marais. Sinner is a location laden with many pasts. An area of multiple expressions among heritage, design and architecture. Inside, the designer Tristan Auer emphasizes the volumes with his atypical, highly visual combinations.Paris is free here.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Therese
description: This 4-star hotel is located at the heart of the chic right bank in central Paris. It offers guest rooms with a refined décor and free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each room has a private bathroom including a hairdryer. At the Hôtel Thérèse, breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room or in guests' rooms upon request. After breakfast, guests can book tickets to tourist attractions from the tour desk on site. Ideally located near many of the city’s main attractions, the Therese hotel is only 400 metres from the Louvre Museum. Opéra Garnier is just 600 metres away. The hotel offers an airport shuttle at an extra cost.

name: Hôtel Adèle & Jules
description: Hotel Adele & Jules provides a comfortable setting while in Paris. It offers free wireless internet in public areas, an all-hours reception and massages. The hotel has 60 rooms and has been recently refurbished. Airport transfers, a laundry service, babysitting/child services and a dry cleaning service are available on enquiry. Hotel Adele & Jules offers air conditioned rooms with slippers and a flat-screen TV. The bathrooms feature a shower and offer a hair dryer and bathrobes. Those staying at Hotel Adele & Jules can enjoy the in-house bar, suitably based for socialising in the evening. A variety of dining options are also available in close proximity to the property. Paris's well-known attractions are within close proximity to the hotel, with the Le Palace just a short walk away. Galeries Lafayette and the Opera-Comique are a short walk away.Revato

name: Nolinski Paris
description: Nolinski Paris is set in the 1st arr. District in Paris, 500 metres from Tuileries Garden and within easy reach from the Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré shopping area. This Parisian 5-star hotel features a spa with a pool, a sauna, a hammam and massage rooms. In the spa, guests can enjoy La Colline beauty products. The bright and spacious rooms and suites of Nolinski Paris are fitted with fine bedding, spacious wardrobes, plush carpets and rich curtains, and feature an elegant desk. Bathrobes and slippers are available for your comfort. Some rooms offer windows and balconies opening out onto the heart of Paris. Nolinski Le Restaurant offers guests the opportunity to enjoy dishes created by the hotel's executive chef, Philip Chronopoulos, whilst surrounded by decor by British designer John Whelan, who has combined Art Deco style with 1970s touches. The Grand Salon invites guests to relax with soothing teas, to sample Mediterranean dishes for lunch and dinner, or enjoy late-night cocktails. Nearby the property guests can enjoy a lunch or dinner at the Two-Michelin-Starred Palais Royal gourmet restaurant. Nolinski Paris reception staff are available 24/7. Louvre Museum and Opéra Garnier can be reached within 1 km of the hotel. The nearest airport is Paris Orly Airport, at 15 km from Nolinski Paris.

name: Hôtel d'Orsay
description: Located in a 18th-century building on Paris left bank, the Hotel d'Orsay is a lovely place to enjoy the charm of the city. Its central location is very convenient to discover the town and its wonders such as the Orsay and Louvre Museums, The Eiffel Tower and Notre Dame.Assemblée Nationale Metro Station is 300 meters from the property and provides direct access to the other attractions of Paris. Each of the 42 rooms is unique, decorated with antique furniture, authentic artwork and carefully selected fabrics. All equipped with a flat-screen TV, free WiFi access and air conditionning. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and a continental one can be enjoyed in the comfort of the guest rooms. The Hotel d'Orsay also offers free coffee and tea at any time in the lobby but also a tea time with cake and biscuits during the afternoon. Our front desk team remain at the guests disposal 24h/24, always willing to assist and provide some good advices regarding conciergerie (restaurants, tickets, taxis.).

name: Terrass Hotel
description: Le Terrass” Hôtel is set in a 19th century building in the heart of the Montmartre district. Just a 15-minute walk from the Sacré-Coeur Basilica, the 4-star hotel offers elegantly decorated rooms with air conditioning. Serviced by 3 lifts, all rooms are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi access, a minibar and a private bathroom. Guests can admire the Eiffel Tower when having breakfast on the rooftop terrace of Le Terrass” Restaurant Bar. Its panoramic terrace features large bay windows and offers clear views of Paris. A 24-hour front desk with concierge service is provided. Free internet facilities are available. Guests can explore the picturesque Montmartre district or go to the Moulin Rouge, which is 450 metres away. Metro Blanche (line 2) is 500 metres from the hotel and allows direct access to the Arc de Triomphe. The Grands Magasins department stores and Opéra are a 20-minute walk away.

name: Villa Madame
description: The hotel La Villa Madame is located in Paris’s arty 6th arrondissement, in the Saint-Germain-des-Prés district. The modern air-conditioned rooms have a refined style and offer free WiFi access. Rooms at La Villa Madame are equipped with a flat-screen TV and iPod docking station. All rooms are soundproofed and have a private bathroom. A continental breakfast is served in buffet format every morning, and it can be enjoyed in the comfort of your room, in the lounge area or in the garden during the summer months. Guests are invited to relax in lounge area by the fireplace. French and English newspapers are available at the hotel and there is also a library with board games. La Villa Madame offers a 24-hour concierge service. The hotel is situated only 350 metres from Saint-Sulpice Church and 200 metres from Luxembourg Gardens. The hotel is served by Metro stops Saint-Sulpice and Rennes. Luxembourg RER station is 700 metres away and offers direct train access to both Roissy Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports.

name: Le Méridien Etoile
description: Le Méridien Etoile welcomes you to the City of Lights with effortless elegance and an exceptional service. Our hotel's location facilitates discovery of Paris's luminous attractions; in addition to being across from the Palais des Congrès, we're a short walk from the Champs Élysées and the Arc de Triomphe. Equally suitable for corporate travelers, leisure guests and families, we bear the proud distinction of being the flagship Le Méridien hotel in Paris, France, with captivating modern design and boutique amenities. Artfully appointed accommodation includes modern technology, luxurious bath products and the Le Méridien Signature Bed. Start your day with a delicious meal and return in the evening to savor dinner in our restaurant. Visit the Jazz Club Etoile, where live music provides the backdrop for cocktails and conversation. Host a memorable event in one of our flexible spaces, which can accommodate groups of any size.Marriott

name: Hotel Square Louvois
description: Hôtel Square Louvois is situated in the 2nd district of Paris. Garnier Opera is a 10-minute walk from the property and Louvre Museum is a 15-minute walk away. An indoor swimming pool with a hydromassage bench are at guests’ disposal upon reservation and without charge. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All rooms feature a Nespresso coffee machine, a minibar and a HD flat-screen TV. They all have a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and a shower or a bath. Some rooms include a Bluetooth radio alarm and a sofa bed. A continental breakfast is served every morning in the restaurant or in your room. A sweet snack is also offered from 16:00 to 18:00 with cakes, pastries, teas and chocolate. Guests can also enjoy a 24-hour fitness room. Massage and beauty treatments can be arranged on site. The nearest metro station is Quatre-Septembre, a 3-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Paris-Orly Airport, 16 km from the Hôtel Square Louvois.

name: La Clef Champs-Élysées Paris by The Crest Collection
description: Conveniently set in the centre of Paris, La Clef Champs-Élysées Paris by The Crest Collection provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free broadband WiFi and a garden. This property also provides guests with a terrace. All accommodation has free high-speed wifi access, a flat-screen TV, a safe, a coffee machine and kettle. The studios and apartments have a fully equipped kitchen with induction hob, microwave, fridge and dishwasher. La Clef Champs-Élysées Paris offers a fitness room, a furnished garden, a breakfast area, a bar and a restaurant. 24 hour reception and concierge services are offered. La Clef Champs-Elysées Paris by The Crest Collection is located on the edge of the Parisian Golden Triangle, this part of the 8th arrondissement surrounded by Montaigne avenues and Champs-Elysées. The Louis Vuitton store is 2-minutes and the Arc de Triomphe is 10 minutes by car.

name: Hotel Duo
description: No description found

name: Hotel Madison
description: Situated opposite Saint-Germain-des-Prés Church, Hotel Madison is located in the heart of Paris’ Latin Quarter. It offers modern accommodation and an elegantly decorated bar. The ensuite guestrooms at Hotel Madison are decorated in a contemporary style. Modern facilities include satellite TV, a minibar and free Wi-Fi access. Every morning a continental breakfast is served in the authentic breakfast lounge. In the evenings, guests can relax with a drink at the stylish bar. Choose from a selection of wines, teas and fruit juices. Hotel Madison’s location makes it easy to access the principal tourist sights of Paris including the Louvre and Orsay museums and Notre Dame Cathedral.

name: Hôtel de Varenne
description: With a flowered garden and a terrace, Hôtel de Varenne is located in Paris, just 500 metres from Les Invalides and 600 metres from the Orsay Museum. It offers free WiFi, a 24-hour front desk and consists of 24 individually decorated rooms and 2 suites. Each accommodation type is soundproofed and features air conditioning, a safe and a flat-screen TV with cable, satellite and pay-per-view channels. The bathroom is complete with free toiletries, a bath and a hairdryer. Slippers and bathrobes are also provided. Breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the breakfast room or in the comfort of your room. Guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar. The property is 900 metres from Place de la Concorde and 290 metres from the Varenne Metro Station, which leads directly to the Champs-Élysées Avenue.

name: Grand Powers
description: Located in Paris' Golden Triangle, Grand Powers is a 5-star boutique hotel in the 8th arrondissement. Guests staying at the hotel can enjoy the spa which has a Turkish bath, a sauna and a hot tub. Some rooms and suites at the Grand Powers are decorated with parquet and a chimney, and some offer a balcony and views of the Eiffel Tower. Each room has a Smart TV and a Nespresso coffee machine, and the bathrooms have Dyptique toiletries. The hotel serves an American buffet breakfast each morning. Guests can dine and enjoy a drink in the Café 52 restaurant and bar. The Clefs d’Or Concierge at the hotel can provide tips on the area. The Champs-Elysées is 250 metres from Grand Powers and Avenue Montaigne is 350 metres away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: Hôtel Garden Elysées
description: Located a 7-minute walk from the Trocadero Gardens and 1.1 km from the Eiffel Tower and the Arc de Triomphe, this hotel features free WiFi, a fitness centre and a patio. Rooms at the Garden Elysée are serviced by a lift, air-conditioned and include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. They also have a private bathroom and large windows with views of the garden. Breakfast can be delivered to guests’ rooms or selected from the buffet and taken on the patio. Guests can also enjoy a drink from the bar beside one of the 2 fireplaces or in the conservatory. In summer, the patio is filled with flowering plants. There is a 24-hour front desk and a luggage storage at the property. Boissière Metro station is just a 2-minute walk away, and provides access to the city's main attractions, including the Champs Elysées.

name: Maison Breguet
description: Maison Bréguet is a hotel with a restaurant and a bar in Paris, 500 metres from Place de la Bastille. Guests can enjoy massages and use the fitness centre in this 5-star hotel. All rooms have air-conditioning and soundproofing. The private bathrooms have either a bath or a shower and include free toiletries and slippers. Each room has a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property and the restaurant specialises in French cuisine. Other facilities at Maison Bréguet include a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and a garden. A laundry service is available for a fee and there is also a business centre. Opéra Bastille is 650 metres from Maison Bréguet, while Place de la République is a 17-minute walk from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 18 km away.

name: Renaissance Paris Nobel Tour Eiffel Hotel
description: Discover our hidden gem, the Renaissance Paris Nobel Tour Eiffel Hotel, located in the very chic and peaceful 16th Arrondissement of Paris, just around the corner from the most notorious Parisian landmarks: the Eiffel Tower, the Arc-de-Triomphe and the Champs-Élysées. Once the Parisian fort of the brilliant Alfred Nobel, and home to his orchid greenhouse, the four remarkable buildings of our hotel, surrounding an enchanting garden, will take you on a travel back in time to the Paris of the 1870s. Whether you are visiting the City of Lights for work, leisure, or a romantic getaway, our impeccable service and unique events will make us your first choice for your Paris trip.Marriott

name: Suites et Hotel Helzear Etoile
description: Located a 5-minute walk from the Champs Elysées, Suites & Hôtel Helzear Etoile is 500 metres from Charles de Gaulle Étoile RER and Metro Stations, providing direct access to Paris’ main tourist attractions and Disneyland Paris. It offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi and guests can relax on the property's sun terrace. Apartments and studios are spread over four floors and are serviced by a lift. They feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A fully equipped kitchen with a refrigerator, a Nespresso coffee machine and a microwave are provided in each accommodation type. A continental breakfast can be delivered upon prior request. Other facilities include a 24-hour reception, a concierge service and a laundry service. Suites & Hôtel Helzear Etoile is 1.6 km from the Eiffel Tower, 500 metres from the Arc de Triomphe and 750 metres from the Seine River. Avenue Georges V is a 3-minute walk away. An airport shuttle service can be arranged at an extra cost.

name: Hotel Claridge Paris
description: Hotel Claridge is located in Paris’s 8th district, just 300 metres from the famous Champs-Élysées. It provides 4-star accommodation and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Claridge rooms are decorated with period furniture, traditional woodwork, and bedspreads and fabric wall covering that match the curtains. Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony. Claridge Paris has implemented a number of measures to reduce its impact on the environment including use of low-energy light bulbs, bathroom amenities in recyclable packaging and water flow reducers. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast in the breakfast room and a continental breakfast can be delivered to your room at an extra cost. Claridge’s bar serves a variety of drinks and snack room service is also available. Guests have access to many restaurants near the hotel. Hotel Claridge Paris is a 5-minute walk from the Franklin D. Roosevelt Metro (lines 1 and 9) and the Seine River.

name: Helzear Montparnasse Suites
description: Set in central Paris, Suites Helzear Montparnasse offers furnished suites and apartments as well as a garden with a terrace. It is 10 minutes' walk from the Montparnasse Tower and Jardin du Luxembourg is 1.5 km away. The apartments feature a flat-screen TV, iPod docking station, ironing facilities and safety deposit box. It also includes a private bathroom and fully-equipped kitchen. Some apartments have air conditioning. Guests can order catered meals. Local cafes and restaurants can be reached within a 10-minute walk. Gaité Metro Station is 500 metres away from Suites Helzear Montparnasse. Denfert-Rochereau Metro and RER Station is an 8-minute from the property and the RER line B takes you to Roissy – Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports.

name: La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris by The Crest Collection
description: Located in the 16th district of Paris, La Clef Tour Eiffel Paris by The Crest Collection is just 900 metres from the Eiffel Tower and 4.4 km from Parc des Princes Stadium. Set in 2 uniquely decorated buildings the property features a landscaped garden and a fitness room. The contemporary-style rooms are equipped with a minibar and a TV with cable channels. Each room has a private bathroom decorated with white marble furnishings and is equipped with complimentary toiletries and slippers. Free WiFi is available throughout the residence. A continental breakfast is served in the breakfast room or guests can order breakfast in their rooms. Free hot drinks, juice and pastries are served every day from 15:00 until 17:00. Additional facilities include a laundry and dry cleaning service. A business centre and meeting/banqueting facilities are also available for guests' convenience. With private parking on site, the hotel is only 300 metres from Trocadéro Metro Station, providing access to the Champs Elysées.

name: Hotel Raphael
description: Situated a 2-minute walk from the Champs-Elysees and the Arc de Triomphe, this 5-star hotel offers luxury accommodation in the heart of Paris. It offers a panoramic terrace and a gastronomic restaurant. Decorated in a Louis 15th and 16th style, guest rooms feature wooden furnishings and elaborate wall hangings. They include a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some of the suites feature a balcony, views of the Eiffel Tower and lounge area. Chef proposes gourmet French cuisine at the sophisticated Raphael Restaurant. Guests can relax and have a snack, tea, drink or just relax in the English Bar's red velvet armchairs. During the summer season, guests can quench your thirst or sit down for a summertime meal on the splendid rooftop located on the 7th floor. Like is a true hanging garden, the rooftop offers a panoramic 360° view over Paris where guests can take in the Eiffel Tower, the Arc de Triomphe, the Sacré Cœur. Other facilities at the hotel include free Wi-Fi access, hammam, a sauna and a fitness room. Charles de Gaulle – Etoile Metro Station is just 400 metres away, providing direct access to the Louvre Museum and the Grand Palais. Trocadero is a 15-minute walk away, which offers one of the best views of the Eiffel Tower in Paris.

name: Hotel Pulitzer Paris
description: Pulitzer Paris is located in Paris’s 9th district and is a 12-minute walk from Opera Garnier. It offers air-conditioned rooms, a bar and free Wi-Fi. The soundproofed rooms at Pulitzer Paris feature a monochromatic decor. Each is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with bath or shower. Pulitzer Paris serves a daily buffet breakfast with fresh and cooked foods. Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel’s bar before exploring a range of restaurants in the neighbourhood. Hotel staff are available 24 hours and both cars and bicycles can be rented directly from the hotel. Pulitzer is a 2-minute walk from Grands Boulevards Metro (lines 8 and 9) and Le Peletier Metro (line 7). It is also possible to walk to local sights such as the Musée du Louvre (20 mins).

name: Sofitel Paris Arc de Triomphe
description: Our 5-star luxury hotel is a true haven of peace being in a very calm street, and yet close to the bustling Champs Elysées, the main fashion avenues and great museums. With its Haussmann façade and contemporary interior design, it will seduce you for business trips and family weekends. The Parisian rooms and suites, Les Cocottes restaurant and its terrace with Chef Christian Constant will make your stay unforgettable.accorhotels.com

name: New Hotel Lafayette
description: New Hotel Lafayette is located in the Opera district, 300 metres from Cadet Metro Station. It offers contemporary rooms with Wi-Fi access and is just 1 km from Gare du Nord. Combining original wooden beams with a modern décor, the rooms at New Hotel Lafayette feature a TV with satellite channels and a bottle of mineral water. Each is air-conditioned and the en suite bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. The breakfast room is located in the arched cellar and offers a buffet breakfast every morning. After an aperitif in the hotel bar, the 24-hour reception can advise guests on restaurants in the local area. Galeries Lafayette department store and the Sacré Coeur Basilica are both a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Cadet Metro Station leads to tourist attractions such as the Opéra Garnier and the Louvre Museum.

name: Le General Hotel
description: Situated in Paris’ 11th district, General Hotel is just a 5-minute walk from Republique Square and has a fitness centre with sauna. Accommodations feature a Nespresso coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. All the air-conditioned rooms at Le Général Hôtel have an iPod docking station. L'Occitane amenities are included in each private bathroom, which is equipped with a hairdryer and bathtub or shower. Sweet and savoury breakfast items can be served directly to guests’ rooms or selected from the buffet. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s bar and enjoy the selection of international newspapers. The Hotel General is 350 metres from Republique Metro Station, which offers connections to 4 metro lines. Shopping and cafés in the popular Marais district are 500 metres away. The Georges Pompidou Centre is a 30-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel Ducs de Bourgogne
description: A 5-minute walk from The Louvre, this refined hotel offers air-conditioned rooms in the very centre of Paris. Notre Dame Cathedral is 1 km away. The elegant guestrooms at Hotel Ducs de Bourgogne have a Louis Philippe style décor with wooden furniture and luxurious fabrics. They feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a work area with a desk. All rooms are serviced by an elevator. Some rooms are accessible for guests with reduced mobility. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the hotel’s renovated cellar or in guests’ rooms upon request. A room service offering drinks and snacks is also available. The reception area at Hotel Ducs de Bourgogne is open 24 hours a day and offers a concierge service. Free newspapers are available each day in the lobby area. Louvre-Rivoli Metro Station is 300 metres from the hotel and offers direct access to the Champs-Elysées and the Arc de Triomphe.

name: La Villa Maillot
description: La Villa Maillot is a renovated, 18th-century villa, combining a classic décor and modern design. Located in Paris, it offers a wellness centre, a bar lounge and an indoor, Japanese garden. Porte Maillot Metro Station is 200 metres away. All of the rooms at La Villa Maillot have a unique, colourful décor. Each soundproofed room has a seating area, a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. Each room also includes an en suite bathroom with a shower. Every morning you can choose between a continental and a full English breakfast. After breakfast, you can relax with a drink from the bar, by the fireplace. The wellness centre features a sauna, a hammam and a massage room. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the property. The Arc de Triomphe is 800 metres from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Artus
description: Hôtel Artus is in the heart of Saint Germain des Près on Paris’ chic left bank. It is a boutique hotel offering a sauna and luxury rooms and suites, 1-minute walk from Mabillon Metro Station. Guests can use the sauna. Decorated in soft pastels and bright printed fabrics, accommodation at Artus features an iPod docking station and an LCD TV. The private bathrooms have the added comfort of bathrobes and slippers. Located in the cellar, the modern breakfast room offers a hot and cold buffet every morning. Additional facilities include free Wi-Fi and massages can be booked at the 24-hour reception. Local transport links conveniently lead directly to sights such as Jardin des Plantes and Ile-de-la-Cité. The Seine is a 5-minute walk from the hotel and Cluny’s Medieval Museum is just 700 metres away.

name: Hotel Residence Foch
description: This modern Paris hotel is located within a 10-minute walk of Porte Maillot Metro Station. It offers 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This elegant hotel provides a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and an express check-in and check-out feature. Wi-Fi is also provided. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms provide a mini bar, heating and a flat-screen TV. They all have ironing facilities, a bathtub and a telephone. Paris's attractions, such as Porte Maillot, Palais Des Congres De Paris and Avenue Victor-Hugo, are within easy walking distance of Hotel Residence Foch. Guests can also visit Place Charles de Gaulle and the Arc De Triomphe.Revato

name: Hotel Le 10 Bis
description: Situated in Paris, Hotel Le 10 BIS offers stylish, 4-star accommodation close to Palais Des Congres De Paris. Guests can also enjoy complimentary wireless internet. The hotel has 23 rooms and has been recently refurbished. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, a coffee maker and a refrigerator. Each one features a flat-screen TV with cable channels, as well as a private bathroom. Hotel Le 10 BIS serves breakfast every morning, and guests are welcome to unwind with a drink in the lounge bar. A wide selection of dining options are also found in the area. Hotel Le 10 BIS is close to Porte Maillot Metro Station, making it easy for guests to explore Paris and its surrounding areas. Place Charles de Gaulle, Avenue Victor-Hugo and the Arc De Triomphe are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Hotel Park Lane Paris
description: This 4-star boutique hotel is 750 metres from the Galeries Lafayette department store. Some of the guest rooms feature a private balcony overlooking the city’s rooftops. A flat-screen TV, an iPhone station and a minibar are included in all of the soundproofed and air-conditioned guest rooms. They also feature an espresso coffee machine and includes free WiFi access. The private bathrooms offer free toiletries, bathrobes and a hairdryer. Cocktails are served in the hotel bar, which is open 24 hours a day. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room at Hotel Park Lane Paris, or in guests' room upon request. With a 24-hour reception, the hotel offers a tour desk, a ticket service and a fitness room. Massages are also available. Miromesnil Metro Station is 280 metres away, providing access to the Champs Elysées. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Le Littre
description: Hotel Le Littré is set in Paris, between St Germain des Pres and Montparnasse, 100 metres from Rue de Rennes shopping district. Set in a building originally built in the early 20th century, it offers modern and soundproofed rooms with panoramic views over the city. The air-conditioned rooms and suites are equipped with free WiFi access, double glazed windows, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Bathrobes and slippers are provided in all rooms. Some rooms have a separate living area and a balcony or terrace with views of the capital. The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast with American, gluten-free and continental options in the dining area. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel’s bar. In addition to a 24-hour reception, Le Littré provides a laundry and dry cleaning service as well as business facilities. All rooms and suites are serviced by 2 lifts. There is also a veranda and a sauna. Saint Placide Metro Station and Montparnasse Train Station is 350 metres from Hotel Le Littré, providing easy access to Paris's many sites such as Saint Michel and Chatelet. A private secured parking is available with an extra charge.

name: Hôtel Hélios Opéra
description: This eco-friendly hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the Galeries Lafayette department store and the Opéra Garnier. Sacré-Coeur Basilica can be easily reached through Trinité d'Estienne d'Orves Metro Station. Hélios Opéra is entirely non-smoking and offers air-conditioned guest rooms with a design décor. The modern rooms, entirely nonsmoking, are equipped with air-conditioning, free broad band WiFi, laundry service, private safe, minibar, flat-screen TV (satellite and cable), free tea and coffee making facilities. The Deluxe and Executive rooms additionally offer a Nespresso Machine, bathrobe and slippers to the guests. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining room at hotel Hélios Opéra. It features local products, a cheese plate and organic and fair-trade products. After breakfast, guests can use the computer with internet access in the lobby, which features a stained-glass roof. With a 24-hour reception, Hélios Opéra also provides a tour desk and ticket service. The multilingual staff is at your disposal and will be glad to help you to organise your stay in Paris. Chaussée d’Antin – La Fayette Metro Station is 290 metres away, providing direct access to the Louvre Museum and the Champs Elysées. the Eiffel Tower is 3.9 km away.

name: Victoire & Germain
description: The Victoire & Germain hotel is located in the Saint-Germain area of Paris, 1 km from Notre-Dame Cathedral and 1.2 km from the Louvre Museum. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel and there is a 24-hour front desk. Every room in the hotel features air conditioning and soundproofing, as well as a flat-screen TV and coffee machine. All bathrooms have a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Rooms are decorated in a contemporary style. Breakfast is available at Victoire & Germain. Several restaurants and cafés are located within a few minutes’ walk of the hotel. This hotel is situated 260 metres from Odéon Metro Station. Orly Airport is located a 30-minute drive away and Charles de Gaulle Airport is 40 minutes’ drive from the hotel. Paid public parking is available.

name: Hôtel Opéra Richepanse
address: 14, Rue Du Chevalier De Saint George, 75001 Paris
description: Hotel Opéra Richepanse is a boutique hotel in central Paris, a 5-minute walk from Place de la Concorde and the Champs Elysées. The luxury shops on rue Saint-Honoré are 50 metres away. The large, modern rooms each have a flat-screen TV, lighting control system device, music in the private bathroom and a bath or a walk-in shower. Each one also includes air-conditioning and facilities for making tea and coffee, while some also offer views of Madeleine Church. Free WiFi access is available. The hotel provides a full buffet breakfast every morning, served either in the 17th-century dining room or in the comfort of the guest rooms. Daily newspapers are provided. The reception features a marble floor and is open 24 hours. The multilingual staff will be happy to help you organise your stay in Paris. It is 50 metres from Madeleine Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from the Tuileries Gardens, Opéra Garnier and Place de la Vendome. You may also choose to visit the Louvre Museum, which is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Mom'Art Hotel
description: Maison Mom'Art is conveniently located in the popular 18th - Sacre Coeur - Montmartre area. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, postal service, taxi service, ticket service, wheelchair accessible are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Enjoy the fitness center, sauna, massage before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Maison Mom'Art.Agoda

name: Hôtel & Spa Saint Jacques
description: Hotel Saint Jacques offers comfortable en suite accommodation in the heart of Paris’ Latin Quarter. It is near Ile de la Cite and Notre Dame Cathedral. Each Hotel Saint Jacques room is soundproofed and equipped with a private bathroom and satellite TV. Guests are invited to relax with a glass of wine in the hotel’s Toulouse Lautrec lounge. The lounge features a collection of 18th and 19th-century books that guests can leaf through. There are a variety of dining options near the hotel. Staff can organise excursions for you or reserve restaurants on request. Massage treatments and transfers can also be arranged. Saint Jacques’ location makes it an ideal base for exploring Paris. It is just 1 minute on foot from the Maubert–Mutualite Metro (line 10) and Boulevard Saint-Germain. The Gallo-Roman amphitheater, Arenes de Lutece, is 600 metres away. A public parking is available within a 5-minute walk from the property.

name: Suites & Hotel Helzear Champs-Elysees
description: Located in Paris, Suites Helzear Champs Elysées is a 6-minute walk from the Arc de Triomphe and a 22-minute walk from the Eiffel Tower. It offers a 24-hour front desk and and self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Apartments and studios are spread over six floors and are serviced by a lift. They feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a bathroom with bath or shower. A refrigerator, a Nespresso coffee machine and a microwave are provided in each accommodation type. There is also a stove, a minibar and kitchenware. Suites Helzear Champs Elysées is a 3-minute walk from the Champs-Elysées Avenue and 650 metres from the Seine River. George V Avenue is a 3-minute walk away. An airport shuttle service can be arranged at an extra cost.

name: Hotel Flanelles Paris
description: Boasting a bar and a spa and wellness centre, Maison ELLE Paris is set in Paris, 600 metres from Arc de Triomphe and 1.4 km from Palais des Congrès de Paris. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel offers a sauna and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Maison ELLE Paris all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. Eiffel Tower is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Gare Saint-Lazare is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly Airport, 23 km from Maison ELLE Paris.

name: Maxim Opéra
description: Set a 10-minute walk from the luxury Galeries Lafayette department store, this 4-star hotel offers an on-site bar and free WiFi access. Cadet Metro Station is 200 metres from Hôtel Maxim Opéra and provides access to the Louvre. The rooms at Hôtel Maxim Opéra are decorated in stone-coloured tones and have an LCD TV with satellite channels. Each one also features a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. A courtesy tray is at your disposal. You can enjoy the buffet breakfast in the breakfast room or in the comfort of your guestroom. Newspapers, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception are just some of the other hotel facilities. Paris’ other sights, such as the Opéra Garnier and the chic Place Vendome are a 10-minute walk from the property. If you are arriving by train, both Gare du Nord and Gare de l’Est are a 20-minute walk away. Grands Boulevards Metro Station is 400 metres away and gives direct access to the Eiffel Tower and Champs Elysees.

name: Hotel Louison
description: Hotel Louison is located in central Paris, 500 metres from the Montparnasse Bienvenüe Metro (lines 4, 6, 12 and 13). Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Eco-label certified, the hotel has soundproofed and air-conditioned rooms with lift access and satellite TV. Among our eco-responsible commitments, we chose to offer a homemade breakfast buffet with local and seasonal products. Every evening, a homemade aperitif with a selection of drinks and appetizers is available free of charge in the dining room. The hotel is 800 metres from the Bon Marche and 1.3 km from Saint-Germain-des-Prés. From the Montparnasse Bienvenüe Metro, guests can quickly access the rest of central Paris.

name: Hôtel de Banville
description: This hotel is just a 15-minute walk from the Champs-Elysées and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi access. Each guest room has a private bathroom and some rooms offer a balcony or an Eiffel Tower view. They are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A breakfast buffet with homemade pastries is served daily in the lobby area. Guests can also relax by the fireplace in the bar. Hôtel de Banville is a 2-minute walk from the restaurants at Place du Maréchal-Juin and close to the Porte Maillot Convention Centre and Espace Champerret. Porte de Champerret Metro Station is 100 metres away. Private airport transfers can be organised at the 24-hour reception.

name: Hotel Régina Opéra Grands Boulevards
description: Hôtel Regina Opéra Grands Boulevards is located in central Paris in the lively Grands Boulevards district, near theatres, concert halls. The Regina is a 10-minute walk from Canal Saint-Martin and just a 3-minute walk from Bonne Nouvelle Metro Station, which offers direct access to Place de la Concorde and the Eiffel Tower. The modern, air-conditioned rooms are decorated in warm colours and feature a satellite TV, free WiFi access and soundproofing. They also have a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms are serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast offering fresh products is served each morning in the bright breakfast room. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the bar. Hotel Regina offers a 24-hour reception and free newspapers, as well as a laundry and a dry cleaning service. Restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance. Guests can also easily visit the Marais district and Le Louvre is a short Metro ride away.

name: Hôtel De Buci
description: This classical style, 4-star hotel is located in the Saint Germain area of Paris. Hôtel De Buci offers luxuriously decorated rooms with antique furnishings in the heart of the Latin Quarter. The soundproofed guest rooms at Hôtel De Buci have a typical Parisian charm with their velvet curtains and antique wooden furniture. Each room features Cable TV and a minibar. The Hôtel De Buci serves a buffet breakfast daily in the elegant breakfast room, and the hotel also features a 24-hour bar. Guests can visit the most famous sights of Paris easily, such as the Louvre and the Luxembourg Gardens, both of which are less than 10 minutes by foot from the hotel. There is also a concierge service for guests needing travel information.

name: Hôtel Belloy Saint-Germain
description: Hôtel Belloy Saint Germain is located in the historic Saint Germain district, near the Luxembourg Gardens and Notre Dame Cathedral. It offers modern air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi, satellite channels, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom. Rooms are accessible by a lift. The restaurant provides a buffet breakfast served in the classy dining area. Guests can enjoy a drink from the hotel’s honesty bar. This hotel’s central location allows guests to explore the nearby areas such as the lively Saint-Michel and Odeon. Metro Cluny – La Sorbonne is 270 metres from the hotel, giving guests access to famous sites such as the Eiffel Tower and Jardin des Plantes.

name: Hotel Square
description: Hotel Square is a 5-star boutique hotel in Paris, opposite the Eiffel Tower. It offers elegant rooms and suites with air-conditioning, flat-screen TV with international channels and free Wi-Fi. Beaugrenelle Shopping Centre is a 7-minute walk away and Rue de Passy is 1 km from the hotel. The guestrooms and suites also offer elegant marble bathrooms with bathtub and shower. A Hi-Fi stereo with a CD player, minibar and work desk can also be found in the rooms. There are 2 lounge areas in the Square where guests can relax in front of a large, plasma-screen TV with cable channels. Upon advanced request, the lounges can be used for private receptions. Spa Nuxe is 200m² and offers a variety of well-being and relaxation treatments including massage, a range of beauty treatments and much more. The nearest metro stations are Javel Metro Station, an 11-minute walk from Hotel Square and Passy Metro Station, 14 minutes' walk from the property. RER train station Avenue du Président Kennedy is a 5-minute walk from the property. The hotel has its own parking garage.

name: Hyatt Paris Madeleine
description: Hyatt Paris Madeleine is located in central Paris, a 5-minute walk from Madeleine. It features a fitness and spa centre with sauna and massage treatments. Each air-conditioned room is individually decorated and has luxury modern wooden furnishings in light coloured tones. They have views over the Parisian Streets or the courtyard. They also feature a suite bathroom with a bathtub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Le Cafe M restaurant serves breakfast and lunches prepared with seasonal produce. La Chinoiserie serves fresh, local cuisine and a gourmet dinner. It also offers snacks and drinks. Hyatt Paris Madeleine is situated a 5-minute walk from the famous shopping district Boulevard Haussmann, and 10-minutes from the Champs-Élysées. Saint-Augustin Metro Station is 500 metres from the hotel, giving guests access to all of Paris’s famous sites.

name: Hotel Monte Cristo
description: Featuring a bar, Hôtel Montecristo is set in Paris, 1.9 km from Notre Dame Cathedral. The property is around 2.5 km from Opéra Bastille and 2.8 km from Pompidou Centre. The hotel features an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms come with a seating area. All guest rooms at Hôtel Montecristo include air conditioning and a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and an indoor pool. A business centre and vending machines with drinks are available on site at Hôtel Montecristo. Louvre Museum is 3 km from the hotel, while Orsay Museum is 3.5 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 13 km away.

name: Hôtel & Spa Royal Madeleine
description: Boasting a fitness centre and a spa & wellness centre, Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa is situated in Paris. It is 600 metres from Édouard VII Theatre, 500 metres from Olympia and Opéra Garnier and a 14-minute walk from Tuileries Garden. The property is located in the 8th arr. District, 1.4 km from Orsay Museum. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. With a private bathroom, they also feature free WiFi. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. There is an in-house restaurant, which serves European cuisine. When guests need guidance on where to visit, the reception will be happy to provide advice. Galeries Lafayette and Printemps Department Stores are 400 metres away. La Cigale Concert Hall is a 19-minute walk from Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa, while Louvre Museum is a 20-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Parister & Spa
description: Located in Paris, a 2-minute walk from Cadet Metro Station and the Folies Bergère Theatre, and 1.2 km from Opera Garnier, Hotel Parister & Spa features restaurant and a bar, as well as a spa center with a swimming-pool, hammam and a fitness centre available for free. The air-conditioned rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. They all have a Marshall speaker and a private bathroom with free Nuxe toiletries, bathrobes and slippers, while some features a spa bath. Hotel Parister & Spa features free WiFi throughout the property. Breakfast are available each morning from 7am to 10am and until 10.30am on Sunday. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Sacré-Coeur is 1.3 km from Hotel Parister & Spa. Paris - Orly Airport is 16 km away.

name: Hotel Riesner
description: Set in central Paris, this hotel is 350 metres from Gare de Lyon RER Station. It features a 24-hour reception with a ticket service and offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Each guest room includes free Wi-Fi access and tea and coffee making facilities. All of the rooms are serviced by a lift. The private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available every morning. Vending machines selling drinks and snacks are also available. The Hôtel Riesner hotel is just 400 metres from Saint-Martin Canal and the Jardin des Plantes is a 10-minute walk away. The Arc de Triomphe and Disneyland Paris are both accessible via Gare de Lyon.

name: Hôtel Beige
description: The Hôtel Beige is located in the heart of Paris between the Opéra Garnier and Montmartre. Its rooms offer views over the rooftops of Paris. All of the en suite rooms at Hôtel Beige+ are soundproofed and have flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Coffee, tea and drinks can be enjoyed in the hotel’s ground-floor lounge, where a daily breakfast buffet is also served. During their stay, guests can rent a portable WiFi key from the reception, available for a fee. Hôtel Beige is serviced by a lift and offers 24-hour front desk service and free luggage storage.

name: La Clef Louvre Paris by The Crest Collection
description: No description found

name: Majestic Hotel - Spa Champs Elysées
description: This 5-star hotel is located in Paris’s 16th district just 400 metres from Place de l'Étoile and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and guests have free access to the spa facilities. Rooms at Majestic Hotel Spa combine old Parisian style and more contemporary pieces of art. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, iPod docking stations and a private bathroom. Some rooms and suites have a private terrace or kitchenette. Wi-Fi access is available in all the rooms and the hotel also has facilities for disabled guests. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées wellness spa has a swimming pool, hammam and fitness room. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées is 190 metres from Kléber Metro Station (line 6) and 400 metres from Charles de Gaulle – Étoile Metro (lines 1, 2 and 6). The Eiffel Tower is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and the Champs Elysées is 5 minutes away.

name: Hotel du Louvre in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
description: Located in the heart of Paris, this 5-star hotel offers elegant guest rooms in a Hausmannian-style building. Entirely renovated in 2019, it features a concierge and a tour desk with ticket service. Decorated in a unique style, the bright air-conditioned guest rooms at the Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt are equipped with satellite TV, a minibar and free WiFi access. Many rooms offer views of famous Parisian landmarks and all rooms have a private bathroom, some include decorated with marble. The hotel restaurant, La Brasserie du Louvre by Bocuse, was renovated in 2019 and is decorated in a traditional style with authentic features. The menu showcases iconic dishes by Bocuse, designed to delight locals and travellers alike. In the summer, meals are served on the terrace beneath the arches, with a view of the Louvre museum. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail and jazz evenings twice a week in The Bar, which features an authentic glass roof. The 4 facades and terrace of this hotel overlook the famous Louvre Museum, the Opéra Garnier and the Comédie Française theatre. During spring and summer, a picnic basket can be requested for an extra charge, so guests can enjoy picnicking in the Parisian gardens near the hotel. Several activities are available to guests of the hotel free of charge to allow guests to discover hidden gems of the city, including boules at the Tuileries Garden, guided tours of the neighbourhood and a tour of the Napoléon III-style apartments at the Louvre Museum. Hotel du Louvre in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt is situated 2 minutes from Palais Royal Metro Station, providing direct access to the Champs Elysees and the Place de la Bastille. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Hotel de la Tamise
description: Hôtel de La Tamise is located in Paris, just opposite the Tuileries Gardens and a few metres from the Louvre Museum. The elegantly-decorated hotel features a 24-hour reception desk and a bar. The air-conditioned rooms and suites at Hôtel de La Tamise have free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All of the private bathroom will provide you with bathrobes, hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. After a long day of sightseeing, you can sample a hot drink in the comfort of your room thanks to the electric kettle or the coffee machine. Extras include a desk, a safety deposit box and a laptop safe. Other facilities offered at the property include a ticket service and luggage storage. The hotel is 700 metres from Orsay Museum and 800 metres from Opéra Garnier. Tuileries Metro Station, 100 metres away, provides direct access to the famous Champs-Elysées.
